title: Syncing Lvl
body:
Trying to sink my client level and forum level.  Says I'm lvl 1 and I'm lvl 5 now.

Hopefully it works.  If not, would someone from Riot be so kind as to give it a little nudge?  Much thanks!

replies.body: Sometimes your account has to sync with the boards when posting for the first time.  Your post looks to have sync'd your profile.  :D  And we'll all float on okay.

Well that didn't work.. not yet anyway :c  Sadface.

EDIT: Nevermind the second post actually fixed it lol.  Thanks!
